title: ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 14 Professor and Other Posts
description: The Employees’ State Insurance Corporation ( ESIC) Karnataka has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 14 Professor, Associate Professor, and Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BDS, Post Graduation, Any Degree, MBBS, MD, Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the ESIC Karnataka Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for th...
